summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ellavera Beauty cosmetic manufacturing website. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly with minor UI interaction issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Admin login form submission not working - credentials filled but login doesn't proceed
Product card links not clickable - HTML element intercepts pointer events

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login form not properly integrated with backend auth API

issues: WhatsApp floating button not found on homepage

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)
Homepage loading and hero section display
Navigation between main pages (Products, Contact, Articles, About)
Contact form submission and success message
Products page loading with category filter
AI content generation via backend API
AI image generation via backend API
Contact lead management via backend API
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form submission - the form fills correctly but doesn't submit/redirect to admin dashboard. Backend auth API works perfectly, so this is a frontend integration issue. Also fix product card link clickability issue.
